Slag stared at Hoist. "Flamethrower.  Stupid bot, the name is Slag, not 
flamethrower."

rdahl@... wrote:

> Hoist strained and got up. "Yes well, you were so busy arguing with our
> Flamethrower over there, I didnt think to." he admitted. He worked as
> gently as he could, to reconect the dammaged wire.
